extendedInfo.description: 'Garden Manager' app is essential for gardening.Save your time with various gardening alarms.Why don't you try making vegetable garden and planting lettuce and peppers?You can keep track of the moments that they grow and share them via 'Garden Manager'.Buy flowerpots and feel the clean air.'Garden Manager' will help a lot.* Features1. Various alarm  - Don't forget the time watering your plants in garden.  - You can set alarms for fertilizing, spraying pesticide and so on. Custom tasks are also available.  - When you set the alarm, it tells you on time.2. Plants photo diary  - Keep your lovely plants' photos and memos.  - When you sow seeds and harvest them, you can feel the fun of writing diary notes of the growing appearance observed in your garden.  - If you write widths / heights of your plants in each diary, you can see them on the graph.3. Sharing  - You can boast your diaries to your friends.  - Or ask them why your plants withering.4. Finding nearby florists  - You can find florists nearby you.* Is there any problems?* Please contact us    - facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/GardenManager    - email: jeedoridori@gmail.com* Phone state permission is used for only advertising.Keyword: Garden / Manager / Garden Manager / Plant / Diary / Plant Diary / Plant / Alarm / Plant Alarm / Germinate / Germination / Harvest / Planting / Gardening / Home Gardening / Home Planting / Gardener

reviews.title: Will not let me upload pictures
reviews.comment: Will freeze my phone every time i try to upload very frustrating!!!
reviews.author: Heather Thomas

reviews.title: Awesome app, but issue
reviews.comment: Awesome app.  Been using to keep track of watering and fertilizing.   Since the last update it freezes every time I try and add a picture. Emailed tech support today. Will move to 5 stars when the issue is resolved.  UPDATE: Excellent developer support. Emailed back and forth with me many times, and the initial email response was a mater of hours. Sent me several test APK, and eventually was able to get the issue fixed.
reviews.author: Jesse Oliver

reviews.title: No
reviews.comment: Nice app
reviews.author: nadia nasim

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Now works great on HTC FLYER. Use it to Keep check  on my plants , which plants grow well in extreme heat and short periods of minus temperatures can update as  necessary
reviews.author: michael roberts

reviews.title: A great app
reviews.comment: Very nice except the ad
reviews.author: Yu Jason

reviews.title: It can be better
reviews.comment: Function well. The UI can be better, e.g the plant and the added diaries/memo can be diffirentiate. The other thing is I hope photos wont be cropped actually. So far it is the best plant diary app in android, but still there are rooms for improvement.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good app that gets me out every day, very easy to use and keep a journal
reviews.author: James Chudleigh

reviews.comment: Excellent app. Love that I can set alarms to remind me to bring plants in for winter.
reviews.author: Penny Thoyts

reviews.comment: Love it!!!
reviews.author: kmichel223

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: It has room for improvement. It would be great if it could automatically read your city\'s weather and if you could add a comment to multiple plants simoultaneously (like the time they were watered or the amount of time spent on light). Maybe if you could group some plants. Still, it is great for small crops, I just copy paste.  Love the look and friendly interface.
reviews.author: Barbara Panszi

reviews.title: Its good
reviews.comment: one problem though, I\'m not sure how to submit height and width, so I can use the graph. if someone can tell me how to use that feature that would be great. otherwise pretty good!
reviews.author: Daniel Scott

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: I love the look and utility of this app. It is very well polished and intuitive. I\'m using it to create a journal of my existing garden so that the people about to rent the house can learn about the plants and how to care for them. I would be giving this app five stars but it doesn\'t seem to have a good way to share the journal I\'ve created with other people and devices. You can only share one plant entry at a time. And it shows up as a picture. Needs a way to view the app from multiple devices.
reviews.author: Sarah Ranallo

reviews.title: Awful colors
reviews.comment: I can\'t stand to read the screens cuz of the gray text. What\'s wrong with using black text? I see the same thing on web pages all the time. Stupid kids think gray is cool, but it\'s difficult to read.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Reminder for Outdoor Plants.
reviews.comment: Great to have some kind of reminder for your outdoor plants/garden.  Especially when it\'s hot out, and you might not leave the cool indoors! And with an update to add an alarm for fertilizing.
reviews.author: Teri Roach

reviews.title: Plant encyclopedia
reviews.comment: I currently use two apps - this one to keep track of my plants and another to look up plants and growing info. Add the two together and it\'s a five
reviews.author: Karen Puckett

reviews.title: Happy
reviews.comment: This app reminds me of Viva Pinata. Anyway, I use it all the time. Helps me keep motivated.
reviews.author: Eric Alpine

reviews.title: I love this app!
reviews.comment: I really love this app!... It\'s everything that  I could ask for in a gardening app!... I love looking at how my plant has grown and how tall it has gotten and so on...must have app for every home garden!...
reviews.author: ottena rowe

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Needs refinement and lacking many options, still the best gardening app.
reviews.author: Micha\305\202 Kurz\304\205tkowski

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Great App works so perfect on my Phone.
reviews.author: Roy Lowe

reviews.title: Kyll\303\244
reviews.comment: Toimii
